thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 31 of 61
thread.title: BSR25

author: BSR25
title: BSR25
text:
The blouse was shipped out the day after I placed my order and arrived only two days later even though I live half the world away. It was perfectly wrapped so it wouldn't wrinkle, was exactly as pictured, and the measurements were exactly those listed on the site; so I was able to work out what size I should purchase without any unpleasant surprises.
I would definitely recommend the site.
